title: Be Back
lyrics:
Issjanh-a geujeo balam-i joh-ass-eul ppun-iya
Ni sumgyeol gat-aseo
Issjanh-a geunyang haneun mal-i joh-ass-eul ppun-iya
Neoui modeun ge
Geulibda

Dol-aol geoya i jalilo

Neo hanaman balaboassdeon nawa hamkke haessdeon yagsog

Dasi dol-aol geoya naneun geugos-e sal-a

Neoleul salanghaess-eossdeon neoleul gieoghaneun geon naya



Deul-eobwa neoleul buleudeon nae mogsoli

Jag-eun sumsolikkaji

Aljanh-a uli hamkke hadeon jinan bamdeul-eul

Tto mundeug niga

Saeng-gagna



Dol-aol geoya i jalilo

Neo hanaman balaboassdeon nawa hamkke haessdeon yagsog

Dasi dol-aol geoya haengboghaessdeon geuttaelo

Heeojiji maljadeon naleul an-ajudeon neo



Yunanhi malg-assdeon neoui modeun gieogdeul-i

Nunbusige joh-assdeon geu bam

Dol-aga



Dol-aol geoya i jalilo

Neo hanaman balaboassdeon nawa hamkke haessdeon yagsog

Dasi dol-aol geoya neoneun geugos-e sal-a

Neoleul salanghaess-eossdeon

Neoleul gieoghaneun geon naya
